turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! I need to order two pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like your pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it from Sarpino's Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what would you like on your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want pepperoni and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like your pizza to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want both of them to be extra large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sides for your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like some marinara sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what about drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a Pepsi and a Coca-Cola.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, are you sure that is everything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am quite sure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will place the order right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Keep an eye out for the receipt via text message once this order is placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is it ordered yet?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is processing at this very moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for updating me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is now complete. It wil take about 25 minutes and you will be able to pick it up then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you and have a great day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, and you, too!
